title: With the removal of mana pots are you going to change all the mana costs or just its itemization?

replies.body: Some adjustments to base stats on some characters and more appealing refillable flask options are where we're starting. Additional changes then as needed (preseason tends to be a bit chaotic and all, so various things will need reactive follow up).
And please less energy regen for Zed?

Energy regen tends to be fixed among all of them, I believe.

Unless you're talking about how he gets energy back, but otherwise if he needed nerfs it would likely be his energy costs.

Because right now, flask is focused almost entirely on additional health sustain, and the mana is just a bonus.
Same with biscuits, which is unfortunate for caster supports.
